long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dancing onigiri (or danoni for short) is a html5 web rhythm game. This extension aims to retrieve danoni scores from the html and send them to a database to make a leaderboard. that can be accessed on https://hsvsjq.github.io/database.html
